message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate!
I'll give you 40, it's a good start, but I'm thinking of getting a bit more.
You wanted 60, I'll give you 55, that's as close as I'll go!
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you 30, it's the lowest I'll go.
You're at 30, I'm at 42, let's meet in the middle!
I'm not going to get much lower, you're getting desperate, take it or leave it.
You're at 80, I'm at 38, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but that's as high as I'll go!
I'm not going to give up, I want the majority of the money, take it or leave it.
You're at 90, I'm at 35, I'm running out of options, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to back down, I want 95, it's my best and final offer.
You're at 95, I'm at 32, I'm barely scraping by, please take this!
I'm not leaving anything on the table, take 2 or we both get nothing.
